content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message from an AI response that listed all the files in the current directory, including the "featured_article.txt" file that I previously wrote.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)", "question": "What are some of the features of the Python programming language?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an overview of the Python programming language, including its support for multiple programming paradigms, emphasis on code readability, comprehensive standard library, dynamic typing with memory management, and use in various industries such as web development, scientific computing, and artificial intelligence. It also covers Python's syntax, style guide, built-in types, type hinting, web development capabilities, and compatibility with different platforms and implementations. The text includes references to Python's influence on other programming languages and its development practices, as well as various resources for learning and using it.\n\nLinks: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']", type='action_result')]
"""
